Federal Office of Meteorology and Climatology MeteoSwiss 
MeteoSchweiz / MeteoSuisse / MeteoSvizzera / MeteoSwiss

Switzerland 1864-2014
Annual temperature anomalies from the 1961-90 mean

Mean of 12 homogeneous series: Basel/Binningen, Bern/Zollikofen, Château-d'Oex,
Chaumont, Davos, Engelberg, Genève-Cointrin, Lugano, Säntis, Segl-Maria, Sion,
Zürich/Fluntern

Begert M., Schlegel T., Kirchhofer W., 2005: Homogeneous Temperature 
and Precipitation Series of Switzerland from 1864 to 2000. 
International Journal of Climatology 25: 65-80.

Creation date: 5.1.2015
